```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
data(gapminder_unfiltered)

```

```{r}
#Finding maximum life expectancy

gapminder_unfiltered %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  slice_max(order_by = lifeExp) ->Sumdat
```
